mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(send_account, receive_account, content, send_date, topic_id) VALUES (#{sendAccount}, #{receiveAccount}, #{content}, #{sendDate},#{topicId})
mapper.select: SELECT send_account AS sendAccount, receive_account AS receiveAccount, content AS content, send_date AS sendDate, topic_id AS topicId FROM message WHERE topic_id = #{topicId}
